title: This Cool, Cheap Gadget
description: TODAY'S MYSTERY VIDEO -   QQ Tech Mini Bluetooth Keyboard -   Every so often you uncover something cool and unexpected on Amazon. This mini wireless keyboard happens to be one of those things. It's only $23 bucks!  FOLLOW ME IN THESE PLACES FOR UPDATES Twitter -  Facebook -  Instagram -  Google Plus -
